<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[The Radiant Festival](/Articles.aspx?ID=21)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 64</row>

Uncover the history of the Radiant Festival and explore the fairgrounds of Golarion's largest celebration of life, rebirth, and the glory of Absalom!
name: The Radiant Festival
